sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import SectionHeader from './SectionHeader' import CaseStudyCard from './CaseStudyCard' import TomoImage from '../Assets/tomo-card.png' import KatchImage from '../Assets/katch-card.png' import SismoImage from '../Assets/sismo-card.png' import FocusmateImage from '../Assets/focusmate-card.png' import ParoImage from '../Assets/paro-card.png' import VidbibImage from '../Assets/vidbib-card.png' import CaseStudyArchived from './CaseStudyArchived' import Quotebox from './Quotebox' import NyalaImage from '../Assets/nyala-after.webp' import VybeTogetherImage from '../Assets/vybe-together-card.png' import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import Sismo from '../Pages/Sismo' export default function RecentWork() { return (
Goksu demonstrated strong analytical skills and could easily grasp the whole user journey from the first day of his work, which really impressed me. Thanks to his user empathy skills he helped us redesign the navigation of the app and worked on a slack app which is still to be implemented. Goksu can challenge ideas that make him a great team member and I can envision he is going to have a great career in user experience design.

} person = "Anna Blasiak, Head of Product at Katch" />

Katch

Flexible meetings with real-time availability

Katch

) }
